column2: select (convert (varchar, datepart (year, timestart) )+#+ right (#+convert (varchar, datepart (month, timestart) ), #) ) as yymm, avg (datepart (hour, (timeend - timestart) ) * # + datepart (minute, (timeend - timestart) ) * # + datepart (second, (timeend - timestart) )) as avgseconds from jobs where timeend - timestart > # and timeend is not # and (datepart (hour, (timeend - timestart) ) * # + datepart (minute, (timeend - timestart) )) > = # and taskname not like # and estimate > # group by convert (varchar, datepart (year, timestart) )+#+ right (#+convert (varchar, datepart (month, timestart) ), #) order by convert (varchar, datepart (year, timestart) )+#+ right (#+convert (varchar, datepart (month, timestart) ), #)
